Tuscaloosa.WVUA-CD: WVUA-CD, virtual channel 7 (UHF digital channel 23), is a This TV-affiliated television station serving Tuscaloosa, Alabama, United States that is licensed to Northport. Owned by the University of Alabama, the Class A station maintains studio and transmitter facilities located within the Digital Media Center at Bryant–Denny Stadium on the University's campus. WVUA-CD is one of two commercial television stations that are owned by a public institution (the other being NBC affiliate KOMU-TV in Columbia, Missouri, which is owned by the University of Missouri).
